text: Purusara naridera abalanbana, yehetu allah tadera eka srenike an'ya srenira upare sresthatba diyechena, ebam yehetu tara tadera sampatti theke kharaca kare. Kaje'i satisadhabi narira anugata, gopaniyatara raksayitri, yemana allah raksa karechena. Ara ye naridera ksetre tadera abadhyata asanka karo, tadera upadesa da'o, ara sayyaya tadera eka phele rakho, ara tadera prahara karo. Tarapara yadi tara tomadera anugata haya tabe tadera birud'dhe an'ya patha khujom na. Nihsandeha allah sarbajnata, mahamahima.
